subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] An Elf?
author: Lisby
full_text:
LOL! That's what I hear, too.

Ann

On Oct 27, 2008, at 10:19 PM, Frank Sumption wrote:

>  Noise reduction, and an antenna sheild, and AC only operation on  
> this box. The antenna shield is just about a half dozen turns of  
> #24 insulated wire wrapped over the original coil toward the end of  
> the AM rod antenna, then the other end can be grounded through a  
> switch, or connected to an external wire antenna.
>
>  Frank-s
>
>
> Store, manage and share up to 5GB with Windows Live SkyDrive. Start  
> uploading now
